name: Wrong direction
description:
You may have watched too many movies and now your imagination is running wild... Maybe driving on the highway isn't the best moment for that!

Made in ~30h for the Game jam MizJam1

Controls:

  • Enter to start game
  • W and S to move
  • Esc at any moment to go back to menu
  • Esc x2 to exit game (Windows version)

Music:

  • Menu: Space Ambience by Vilkas Sound
  • Gameplay: Ride of the Valkyries by Wagner, performed by Ulm Philharmonic (EFF: Open Audio License version 1)
